mapper.select: SELECT POST_NO AS postNo, FILE_NO AS fileNo, ORIGINAL_NAME AS originalName, MEMBERS_NO AS memberNo, LOCATION AS location, PAY AS pay, WRITE_DATE AS writeDate, MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, BIRTH_DAY AS birthDay, CERT_FA_YN AS certFaYN, CERT_HE_YN AS certHeYN, CERT_RE_YN AS certReYN, CERT_TE_YN AS certTeYN, AVG_GRADE AS avgGrade FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM JOB_OFFER_LIST WHERE DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE #{START}<=RNUM AND RNUM<=#{END}+9

SELECT FILE_NO AS fileNo, ORIGINAL_NAME AS originalName, POST_NO AS postNo, MEMBERS_NO AS membersNo, TITLE AS title, SELF_INTRODUCE AS selfIntroduce, CARE_TYPE AS careType, CARE_AGE AS careAge, CARE_ACTIVITY AS careActivity, LOCATION AS location, START_DATE AS startDate, END_DATE AS endDate, CARE_DAYS AS careDays, CARE_TIME AS careTime, PAY AS pay, CCTV_YN AS cctvYN, WRITE_DATE AS writeDate, HIT AS hit, MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, PHONE AS phone, GENDER AS gender, BIRTH_DAY AS birthDay, CERT_FA_YN AS certFAYN, CERT_HE_YN AS certHEYN, CERT_RE_YN AS certREYN, CERT_TE_YN AS certTEYN, AVG_GRADE AS avgGrade FROM JOB_SEARCH_POST WHERE POST_NO=#{postNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE JOB_SEARCH SET HIT=HIT+1 WHERE POST_NO=#{postNo}
